summary: Build a simple "Order App" that lets the user enter a party name and item quantities/sizes, then share the formatted order directly via WhatsApp.
architectural_notes: Provide WhatsApp sharing via a text message deep link (wa.me / whatsapp://send) using the generated order text.
Support importing master data (party list and item list) from an Excel/CSV file to populate Party Name and Item Name pickers/autocomplete.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page "Order App" UI that lets the user enter an order with (a) a required Party Name field and (b) order line items containing Quantity, Size (e.g., 20 L, 4 L, 1 L), and Item Name.
Generate a formatted plain-text order message from the form data that matches the userâ€™s intended layout (Party Name followed by each line as "{qty} x {size} {item name}").
Add a "Send on WhatsApp" action that opens WhatsApp with the generated order message pre-filled so the user can send it.
Apply a coherent, consistent visual theme for the app UI (colors, typography, spacing) suitable for quick order entry (clean, invoice-like layout), and keep all user-facing text in English.
Add a UI flow to import Party Names and Item Names from a user-provided spreadsheet file, supporting at least .csv and .xlsx uploads, and parse the file entirely on the client (no backend upload).
Define and document the expected spreadsheet structure for imported lists and implement robust parsing rules to extract Party Names and Item Names.
Persist the imported Party Names and Item Names locally in the browser so they are available on next app load, and provide a way to clear/reset the saved lists.
Update the Party Name input to allow selecting from the imported Party Names list while still allowing manual entry of a new party name.
Update each Line Item's Item Name input to allow selecting from the imported Item Names list while still allowing manual entry of a new item name.
Add downloadable sample/template files for the Import Lists feature so users can easily download a file, fill it in, and upload it back into the app.

Update the Import Lists UI copy to clearly explain (in short form) that users can download a sample template and that the template matches the supported CSV/XLSX formats already described in the Import Lists card.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an order entry form with Party Name field and line items (e.g., 20L, 4L, 1L) with quantities and item names
Generate a formatted order message from the form data
Add "Send on WhatsApp" sharing to send the generated order message directly via WhatsApp
Add Party Name and Item Name selectable lists populated by importing from an Excel file (e.g., upload/import from .xlsx/.csv)
Provide a downloadable sample/template spreadsheet file (CSV/XLSX) that users can use for the import feature
